attributes.action: encourage drivers to buy lpg or dual fuel car with tax breaks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want the govt to encourage use of dual fuel lpg or cng cars and to encourage car producers to develop this technology by issuing usage targets for these cars.  Our economy can only benefit from these technologies are the govt blind to the job opportunities that could arise from encouraging these technologies. Are the govt so shortsighted, will we again be left behind?
